content: simple rasta hat sizing adult s m s - small 54 55 cm 21 21 5 in m - medium 56 59 cm 22 23 in materials yarn - 150 gr 82 m 90 yd super bulky yarn shown in 1 skein of malabrigo rasta suggest needles - 10 mm us 15 circular needles 40 cm 16 length pattern using 10 mm needles cast on 42 for size s 48 for size m stitches + 1 stitches for joining join for working in the round knit 40 rounds in the following stitch pattern round pattern 4 knit stitches 2 purl stitches repeat of 6 stitches 7 times for size s 8 times for size m decreases for size s row 41 purl 2 together across all purl stitches now you should have 35 stitches remaining row 42 44 and 46 knit in pattern with no decreases after row 46 you should have 14 stitches remaining row 43 knit 3 then turn the 4th knit stitch and knit it together with the next purl stitch now you should have 28 stitches remaining row 45 knit 2 together across the row row 47 knit 2 together across the row you should have 7 stitches left row 48 knit all stitches with no decreases 7 stitches decreases for size m row 41 purl 2 together across all purl stitches now you should have 40 stitches remaining row 42 44 and 46 knit in pattern with no decreases after row 46 you should have 16 stitches remaining row 43 knit 3 then turn the 4th knit stitch and knit it together with the next purl stitch now you should have 32 stitches remaining row 45 knit 2 together across the row row 47 knit 2 together across the row you should have 8 stitches left row 48 knit all stitches with no decreases 8 stitches finishing pull yarn through the remaining stitches to close the top and weave in the ends if you want to knit a larger hat such as size l you can cast on 6 more stitches alternatively you could use larger needles like 12 mm us 17
